controller

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Simulation

  • public final class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the flow of the simulation Singleton pattern: there can be only one simulation running at the same time
    Version:
    2016-07-07
    Author:
    Jaeger, Schmidt, Verghelet

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int CLOCKBEAT
      the beat or speed of the clock, e.g.
      static boolean isRunning
      is the simulation running
      static int SPEEDFACTOR
      a speed factor for the clock to vary the speed of the clock in a simple way

      • CLOCKBEAT

        public static final int CLOCKBEAT
        the beat or speed of the clock, e.g. 300 means one beat every 300 milli seconds
